Reviews.Title: my cell
Reviews.Author: karin l medina bracho
Reviews.Content: hola, buenos dias.el teléfono esta en optimas condiciones, sin rayaduras ni manchas.mi operadora de telefonía lo configuro sin problema alguno.muchas gracias

Reviews.Title: Blackberry Bold 9790 Muy Bueno
Reviews.Author: Adrian
Reviews.Content: Excelente Blackberry Bold 9790 totalmente nuevo, liberado para cualquier operadora en Venezuela. El celular llego tal cual se describia en el articulo, los recomiendo ampliamente.

Reviews.Title: loving the Product
Reviews.Author: biant "Biant"
Reviews.Content: Got the order fast .The booklet is in spanish which i don't understand, also the first time i turn on it in spanish also.But managed to change the language so it's not big deal..Really nice and easy to use since i have the 9700 already.Very good product.

Reviews.Title: Factura Comercial Urgente
Reviews.Author: Carmen
Reviews.Content: Buenos Días por favor  enviar Factura comercial al siguiente correo facturas@libertyexpress.com, para que el equipo pueda ser enviado lo mas pronto posible.Good Morning Commercial invoice please send the following email facturas@libertyexpress.com so that the team can be sent as soon as possible.BlackBerry Bold 9790 GSM Unlocked Phone with Full QWERTY Keyboard and 5 MP Camera (WHITE)

Reviews.Title: Factura
Reviews.Author: Liliana Infante
Reviews.Content: Hola, podrían  enviar la orden de compra del producto a los correos de atención de la empresa que recibe mi producto. facturas@libertyexpress.com

Reviews.Title: In good condition
Reviews.Author: Dayrosca L.
Reviews.Content: The cell phone was in perfect condition when opening the package because it had enough protection. very grateful! In accordance with this purchase

Reviews.Title: Product as is
Reviews.Author: Axa
Reviews.Content: Shipped really fast, product is brand new, came with everything that is in the picture, works really well, I have no complaints about this phone....I recommend it!

Reviews.Title: phone
Reviews.Author: elizabeth colina
Reviews.Content: Well, the phone has turned out very good, good I'd say. I recommend them. I bought it for some time and had not had a chance to qualify but they are excellent.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: akbar
Reviews.Content: this mobile very helpful me, received email, and i really thanks to FGS Trading, they estimation time is accurate.i give 5 star because AMAZON is a good place if you need buy something , and the best international place.we in indonesian said is Blackberry Belagio and some of my friend need buy again from me, but i didnt sell, and make me more prestige, and me it life is precious

Reviews.Title: TELF BLACKBERRY 9790... EXCELENTE
Reviews.Author: tavo
Reviews.Content: SE LOS RECOMIENDO TODO LLEGO EN EXCELENTES CONDICIONES, SON RESPONSABLES Y ENVIAN CON PRONTITUD Y MUY BUEN PROTEGIDOS LOS PRODUCTOS

Reviews.Title: Carlos Varela
Reviews.Author: Carlos Javier Varela
Reviews.Content: excelente equipo muy bueno lo recomiendo llego tal y cual como se esperaba y a la fecha indicada muy responsables

Reviews.Title: Cellphone
Reviews.Author: Portelaj
Reviews.Content: excellent phone, for buyers of this phone up 3G Venezuela with Movistar and Movilnet only recommend this phone, keep in mind that the battery does not last more than six hours, I recommend buying another battery

Reviews.Title: URGENT
Reviews.Author: Ginay Torres
Reviews.Content: Good evening, I know because I have sent the team to Venezuela? The purchase I made on December 28 and it is January 5 and not yet in Liberty Express was moving company I chose. I need to know what happens and when sent to Liberty Express of Miami, as I had indicated that I would be coming by today to my country Venezuela

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: Yetzi Carpavire
Reviews.Content: Excelente compra, todo llego nuevo de paquete con todos sus accesorios y completamente desbloqueado sin problemas, contenta con mi compra desde Venezuela, saludos recomiendo al vendedor 100%, ahora disfrutando de mi equipo. Funciona con todas las 4 lineas en Venezuela.

Reviews.Author: gurunlu
Reviews.Content: does it support warranty ?also is it brand new or a refurbished one ?if it has a warranty i can think to buy ,isit also sim free right ?

Reviews.Title: Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Kim Odle
Reviews.Content: I am satisfied with the product, I haven't owned it for a long period but so far I have no issues.  Only this is the battery life isn't as good as I expected or maybe I just use the phone too much

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Bethania Guerra
Reviews.Content: The product arrived in perfect conditions. Like described. Recomended./ El producto llego en condiciones perfectas. Como esta descrito. Recomendado. Desde Venezuela

Reviews.Title: exelente
Reviews.Author: katherine j vasquez g
Reviews.Content: el producto nuevo como lo indican exelente vendedor y recibi a tiempoo, compraria de nuevo con este vendedor, lo recomiendo!

Reviews.Title: muy bueno
Reviews.Author: jose luis cabeza
Reviews.Content: muy bien todo cuando llego todo como decia la publicacion es exelente cel levanta 3G fino al pelo con movistar, mi esposa esta super contenta lo recomiendo gracias....

Reviews.Title: chevere el producto me gusto
Reviews.Author: jeans carlos
Reviews.Content: muy bueno me gusto mucho espero que sigan atendiendo al publico asi. porque asi como ustedes son los mejores vendiendo

Reviews.Title: Fantastic product
Reviews.Author: Derek Ozara
Reviews.Content: i presently like the wifi as am fully utilising it...i havent even started using bbm and other features yet and am already addicted..nice concept including touch and qwerty keyboard..wonderful apps for free....My dislikes are the battery..doesnt last long and the unexpected VAT i had to pay in the uk for the  phoneI recommend this for all those who love texting, chatting, business, surfing the net, music, taking pictures, facebook lovers e.t.c and iphone lovers as well while on a budget..  thumbs up
